pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Gaim (2013, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Sigurd's $(l:gaim/devices/genesis_driver_sigurd)Genesis Driver (Sigurd)$(/l)$(br2)Used to access $(l:gaim/riders/sigurd#cherry_energy)Cherry Energy Arms$(/l) or $(l:gaim/riders/gaim#jimber_cherry)Jimber Cherry Arms$(/l)
